official_title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Interior to undertake a study of the feasibility of increasing the height of the Theodore Roosevelt Dam located in the State of Arizona.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of the Interior to undertake a study of the feasibility of increasing the height of the Theodore Roosevelt Dam in the State of Arizona.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Interior to undertake a study of the feasibility of increasing the height of the Theodore Roosevelt Dam located in the State of Arizona.
